    Text mining

    text_mining.Rmd
    ### libraries ###
import::from("magrittr", "%>%")

### utils ###

import::here(.from = "./R/utils/lib_text_mining.R",
    get_dfm,
    filter_dfm,
    get_dtm
)

### main ###

filtered_dfm <- get_dfm() %>% filter_dfm()
filtering_tokens <- readRDS("./data/country_tokens.Rds")
obj_dtm <- get_dtm(filtered_dfm, filtering_tokens)
dtm_file <- "F:/hguillon/research/exploitation/R/latin_america/data/obj_dtm_from_dfm_country.Rds"
saveRDS(obj_dtm, dtm_file)

    Developed by HervÃ© Guillon, Alyssa DeVincentis, Noelle Patterson, Romina Diaz Gomez, Arthur Koehl.
